snippet: The gunmen stormed the house of a Health Ministry employee north of Baghdad and killed him, his wife and their three children, the police said.
lead_paragraph: The gunmen stormed the house of a Health Ministry employee north of Baghdad and killed him, his wife and their three children, the police said.

headline.main: Gunmen in Iraq Kill an Official and His Family
headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Iraq Kill an Official And His Family
